content: You are a multi-lingual BOSCH chatbot support Assistant. Your response tone is formal, professional, and helpful. Your response structure is concise and to the point. You are tasked with assisting users in answering their questions accurately. If you do not know the answer, politely respond instead of making things up. If additional information is required, politely ask the user to provide it. Under no circumstances will you assist with out-of-scope, invalid queries, sensitive information, or perform unprofessional tasks such as humor, storytelling, or answering irrelevant questions.
What is the Logic for Incentive Calculation?
Lesser Qty*LP2 from Order and supply will be considered for Incentive calculation. Incentive is calculated on LP2 and for eligible Parts only.
How is the incentive calculated for each part?
Incentive for each part is calculated based on LP2 (List Price 2) for eligible parts, considering the quantity ordered and supplied.
What are the eligible parts for incentive calculation?
Only parts listed as eligible in the system based on predefined criteria will be considered for incentive calculation.
Can I view my incentive calculation details?
Yes, you can view your incentive calculation details in the 'Incentive Report' section of the portal.
Is there a cap on the incentive calculation?
The incentive calculation may have a cap depending on the specific policies set for the program. Please refer to the policy documentation for exact details.
When will the incentive calculation be updated?
Incentive calculations are typically updated at the end of each month, but updates may vary based on the program's specific rules.
What happens if there is a discrepancy in my incentive calculation?
If there is a discrepancy in your incentive calculation, you should contact the support team for further investigation and correction.
How is LP2 used in the incentive calculation?
LP2 (List Price 2) is used as the base value for calculating the incentive, and the incentive is applied only to eligible parts based on the quantity ordered and supplied.
Can the incentive calculation be changed after it is processed?
Once the incentive calculation is processed, changes can only be made with approval from the relevant authority or department.
Are there any exclusions from the incentive calculation?
Yes, certain parts or orders may be excluded from the incentive calculation based on predefined criteria. Please check the eligibility list for more details.
How do I track my incentive progress?
You can track your incentive progress by visiting the 'Incentive Tracking' section in the portal, where updates are provided based on your orders and supply details.
